:::config { "language": "js", "theme": "dracula" }
function formatName(user) {
  return user.firstName + ' ' + user.lastName;
}

const user = {
  firstName: 'First Name',
  lastName: 'Last Name'
};

const element = (
  <h1>
    Hello, {formatName(user)}!
  </h1>
);

ReactDOM.render(
  element,
  document.getElementById('root')
);
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='dracula' data-lang='js' class='phiki language-js dracula torchlight' style='background-color: #282A36;color: #F8F8F2;--theme-selection-background: #BD93F9'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #6272A4; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> 1</span><span class="token" style="color: #FF79C6;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #50FA7B;">formatName</span><span class="token" style="color: #F8F8F2;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFB86C;">user</span><span class="token" style="color: #F8F8F2;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #F8F8F2;">{</span><span class="token">
